short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test Pipe nodes and earn points.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join the Guardian Node Revolution and Help Power Pipe Network! Become one of the first Guardians of Pipe Network, where your participation helps monitor, optimize, and secure the network while earning points and rewards.

How to Participate (and Earn Points!):
Becoming a Guardian is easy! Download the Guardian Node Chrome extension, complete the quick setup, and you’re all set to help monitor the network. As a Guardian, you’ll earn points for participation, which can lead to exclusive community benefits and rewards.

Refer Friends, Earn More Points!
Grow the community and your rewards by sharing your referral link. When your referrals join and participate, you’ll earn extra points—an easy way to increase your benefits!

Why Become a Guardian of Pipe Network?

Support the Network: Help keep the network healthy and resilient as a trusted Guardian.
Earn Points and Rewards: Earn points by running a Guardian Node and gain even more by referring others.
Shape the Future: Contribute to a decentralized, user-powered internet and help define the future of content delivery.
